comments:
If you open an JEE5 EAR archive with the Archive API and then open an inner archive of that archive, and then attempt to get the model object for that inner archive a NullPointerException is thrown by JavaEEEMFArchiveAdapterHelper.initializeResourceSet()

SAMPLE STACK TRACE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
